author: Nintendo of America
description:
Disgaea 7 Complete is now available on Nintendo Switch 2: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/disgaea-7-complete-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01       

Return to Hinomoto in style with the definitive version of the critically-acclaimed strategy RPG, Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless! In addition to the base game and all previously-released DLC, Disgaea 7 Complete comes packed with brand new features and content. Enjoy uncapped stats and unprecedented challenges in this impressive update to the Disgaea series' latest and greatest title!  

#NintendoSwitch2 #Disgaea7Complete 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: Disgaea 7 Complete – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 is available now on the Nintendo Switch system: https://ninten.do/6005sWmUb

See what critics are saying about these two galactic adventures!

The games are also individually available on Nintendo eShop. Additionally, a free update that adds 4K resolution support* and mouse controls for the second player is available for Nintendo Switch 2.

*TV and game must be compatible with 4K resolution. Frame rates are capped at 60 fps for 4K output. Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

author: Nintendo of America
description:
PowerWash Simulator 2 is coming to Nintendo Switch 2 on Oct 23, 2025! 

Welcome to orientation. Feel free to take notes as you watch this training video to prepare for your first day on the job.  

Things to Remember:  
-Review the rules of the company 
-Keep your home base clean 
-And don't forget, give Bubbles and Squeak a pet!  

After that, you’ll receive the keys to your homebase, a trustee power washer, and your van to begin exploring Caldera County. Good luck out there! 

#PowerWashSimulator2  #NintendoSwitch2 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Episode four of the #Splatoon3 North American League Show is available now! Get a recap of last week's action and check out some fun segments like Hide and Seek! and another Salmon Run session with Mellana and friends.

Interested in competing? Register here: https://battlefy.com/nintendovs/splatoon3-north-american-league/

Watch this week's Splatoon 3 North American League Event #4 livestream on Saturday, Oct 11th at 4pm PT here: https://youtube.com/watch?v=crclb0rpkIA

Nintendo Switch Online membership (sold separately) and Nintendo Account required for online features. Membership auto-renews after initial term at the then-current price unless canceled. Not available in all countries. Internet access required for online features. Terms apply. 
nintendo.com/purchase-terms/
